title: 371 - The 3 Step Mid-Year Creative Recalibration for Finding Direction Again
description:
Listen and Subscribe on Apple, Spotify and more: https://link.chtbl.com/creativepeptalk

Support the show at patreon.com/creativepeptalk!

Transcripts available at creativepeptalk.com/episodes!

_________

SHOW NOTES

Creative Summer School Series: Part One

Singing Like A Star: Five Steps to Discovering Your Voice - Skillshare Class by Valerie Morehouse

Ologies podcast by Alie Ward

Song Exploder podcast by Hrishikesh Hirway

Twenty Thosand Hertz podcast by Dallas Taylor

Make Creativity Your Career: Six Exercises to Create a Successful Side Project - Skillshare Class

_________

CALL TO ADVENTURE

Find your cows!
Your market models, who are the people who exist in your market? How can you learn from them?

_________

SPONSORS

SKILLSHARE
There’s nothing better than getting better. Accomplishing growth is extremely satisfying, and online classes from Skillshare make it possible. Learn about illustration, design, photography, productivity, and marketing. With Skillshare’s short classes, you can move your creative journey forward without putting life on hold. So explore your creativity at Skillshare.com/CreativePep where our listeners get a free trial of Premium Membership.

STORYBLOCKS
Video is one of my most effective ways to stand out as a creator online these days - and with Storyblocks you can take your videos to the next level - with Affordable Subscriptions, Unlimited Downloads, and 1M+ Royalty Free Assets - you can level up your content at storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Co-Loop Podcast Network)

itunes:title: 371 - The 3 Step Mid-Year Creative Recalibration for Finding Direction Again
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
If you’re overwhelmed and can’t seem to make progress, it may be time to revisit your creative models. When’s the last time you stopped everything and reconnected with your true north?

One of the most centering tools is taking a fresh look at who you’re currently learning from creatively. In this episode I share the 3 step process I recently used to find progress in my creative path again.

This episode is for you if you’re feeling:
- Unoriginal
- Imposter Syndrome
- FOMO
- Lost and Unmotivated
- Like this Year has Already Gotten Away From You!
